title: Prabowo Subianto | Biography, Career, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: Indonesian government faces backlash over Riau land seizures • Nov. 21, 2025, 9:23 PM ET (The Star) ... Prabowo Subianto (born October 17, 1951, Jakarta, Indonesia) is a former general of the Indonesian army and businessman who is now president of Indonesia (2024– ).

title: Didit Hediprasetyo - Wikipedia
snippet: Ragowo Hediprasetyo Djojohadikusumo (born 22 March 1984), or more commonly known as Didit Prabowo, is an Indonesian fashion designer and socialite. He is the only child of current Indonesian president Prabowo Subianto and his former wife, Titiek Suharto, as well as the maternal grandson of former Indonesian president Suharto.
